description: This file is the main entry point of a LightningJS application, defining the application component with a template, routes, and hooks.

classes.name: Application
classes.description: Main LightningJS application component instantiated via Blits.Application

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook called when the application is mounted, used here for logging

calls: console.log('[App] Ready: application mounted and router initialized')
